title: Bug 2345[Editor Mgmt] Open with a different type of editor has no effect if file already open (1GEWMSQ)
description: Bug 2345[Editor Mgmt] Open with a different type of editor has no effect if file already open (1GEWMSQ)
OB: Open a file with the Scripted Resource Editor example. Open the same file with the Default Text Editor. The file should be opened with the Default Text Editor.
EB:
Reproduce the steps in 1GEWMOZ: ITPUI: WIN2000Scripted resource editor example opens on XML files by default:

1. Create a new basic project
2. Create a new file `test.xml`
3. In the Navigator, select `test.xml`
4. Choose 'Open With...' / `Default Text Editor`

Expected: The file should be opened with the Default Text Editor.

Actual: Nothing happens; it reactivates the Scripted Resource Editor example.

Searching for an existing open file should also consider editor types. When opening a file with a different editor type, a new editor should be opened on the file.
SR: Modify the code to correctly open a file with a different type of editor if the file is already open.
